channel.title: git on Jarrod Linahan
channel.description: Recent content in git on Jarrod Linahan

item.title: Should haves; Would haves; Could haves; OR How version control could have saved my ass
item.description: So lately I’ve been working on a few projects in my spare time (Which, I might add, I’ve had a lot of the past few weeks), and things have been going swimmingly. I’m finally coming to grips with the intricacies of Java, and have a little Android app that is almost ripe for the picking. I have also been getting down and dirty with a little Perl, having build a decent framework for a CMS for a friend.
